goal.ch: 瞭解｢電磁學｣的基本知識架構，及其在電動力學和材料科技上的相關應用。
goal.en: Understanding of the basic framework of “electromagnetism” and its applications to electro-dynamics and material-related technologies.

outline.ch: 傳輸線、靜電學、靜磁學、時變場的馬克士威爾方程式、電磁波的特性及其應用
outline.en: Transmission lines,electrostatics, magnetostatics, Maxwell‘s equations for time-varying fields, electromagnetic waves and their applications.
